item.title: Notes from "The Lean Startup: How Todayâ€™s Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses"
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Lean Startup is about quickly building a simple version of a concept, testing it with real users, learning from the results, and improving quickly to reduce the wastage of time and resources.
